member.name: T:CsvAdapters.CsvExportAdapter
member.summary: Represents an output adapter that exports measurements in to a given directory in CSV format.

member.summary: Default value for the property.

member.summary: Default value for the property.

member.summary: Default value for the property.

member.summary: Default value for the property.

member.summary: Default value for the property.

member.summary: Default value for the property.

member.summary: Default value for the property.

member.summary: Default value for the property.

member.name: M:CsvAdapters.CsvExportAdapter.#ctor
member.summary: Creates a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:CsvAdapters.CsvExportAdapter.ExportPath
member.summary: Gets or sets the path to the directory where CSV exports are written.

member.name: P:CsvAdapters.CsvExportAdapter.OffloadPath
member.summary: Gets or sets the path to the directory where CSV exports are moved after a rollover.

member.name: P:CsvAdapters.CsvExportAdapter.RolloverSchedule
member.summary: Gets or sets the schedule, defined by cron syntax, to determine how often to roll over CSV files.

member.name: P:CsvAdapters.CsvExportAdapter.TimestampFormat
member.summary: Gets or sets the format of timestamps in the CSV exports.

member.name: P:CsvAdapters.CsvExportAdapter.HeaderLine
member.summary: Gets or sets the default header line for the CSV exports, set to empty string for no header. Column order is fixed as timestamp, ID, and value.

member.name: P:CsvAdapters.CsvExportAdapter.FileNameTemplate
member.summary: Gets or sets the CSV export filename template. String format parameter 0 is current UTC time.

member.name: P:CsvAdapters.CsvExportAdapter.DownsampleInterval
member.summary: Gets or sets the downsampling interval, in seconds, set to zero for no downsampling.

member.name: P:CsvAdapters.CsvExportAdapter.EnableTimeReasonabilityValidation
member.summary: Gets or sets the flag that determines if timestamps should be validated against local clock for reasonability.

member.name: P:CsvAdapters.CsvExportAdapter.LagTime
member.summary: Gets or sets the allowed past time deviation tolerance against local clock for time reasonability validation, in seconds (can be sub-second).

member.name: P:CsvAdapters.CsvExportAdapter.LeadTime
member.summary: Gets or sets the allowed future time deviation tolerance against local clock for time reasonability validation, in seconds (can be sub-second).

member.name: P:CsvAdapters.CsvExportAdapter.OutputIsForArchive
member.summary: Gets the flag that determines if measurements sent to this are destined for archival.

member.name: P:CsvAdapters.CsvExportAdapter.UseAsyncConnect
member.summary: Gets flag that determines if the data output stream connects asynchronously.

member.name: M:CsvAdapters.CsvExportAdapter.Initialize
member.summary: Initializes .

member.name: M:CsvAdapters.CsvExportAdapter.OffloadLingeringFiles
member.summary: Offloads lingering files which were not offloaded due to errors or system failures.

member.summary: Gets the status of this .

member.name: M:CsvAdapters.CsvExportAdapter.GetShortStatus(System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets a short one-line status of this .

member.name: M:CsvAdapters.CsvExportAdapter.AttemptConnection
member.summary: Attempts to connect to data output stream.

member.name: M:CsvAdapters.CsvExportAdapter.AttemptDisconnection
member.summary: Attempts to disconnect from data output stream.

member.name: M:CsvAdapters.CsvExportAdapter.QueueMeasurementsForProcessing(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{GSF.TimeSeries.IMeasurement})
member.summary: Queues a collection of measurements for processing. Measurements are automatically filtered to the defined .

member.name: M:CsvAdapters.CsvExportAdapter.ProcessMeasurements(GSF.TimeSeries.IMeasurement[])
member.summary: Serializes measurements to data output stream.

member.name: M:CsvAdapters.CsvExportAdapter.Dispose(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the object and optionally releases the managed resources.
member.param: true to release both managed and unmanaged resources; false to release only unmanaged resources.

member.name: T:CsvAdapters.CsvInputAdapter
member.summary: Represents an input adapter that reads measurements from a CSV file.

member.name: M:CsvAdapters.CsvInputAdapter.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:CsvAdapters.CsvInputAdapter.FileName
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the CSV file from which measurements will be read.

member.name: P:CsvAdapters.CsvInputAdapter.InputInterval
member.summary: Gets or sets the interval of time between sending frames into the concentrator.

member.name: P:CsvAdapters.CsvInputAdapter.AutoRepeat
member.summary: Gets or sets value that determines if the CSV input file data should be replayed repeatedly.

member.name: P:CsvAdapters.CsvInputAdapter.SkipRows
member.summary: Gets or sets number of lines to skip in the source file before the header line is encountered.

member.name: P:CsvAdapters.CsvInputAdapter.UseHighResolutionInputTimer
member.summary: Gets or sets flag that determines if a high-resolution precision timer should be used for CSV file based input.
member.remarks:
Useful when input frames need be accurately time-aligned to the local clock to better simulate an input device and calculate downstream latencies.
This is only applicable when connection is made to a file for replay purposes.

member.name: P:CsvAdapters.CsvInputAdapter.MeasurementsPerInterval
member.summary: Gets or sets the number of measurements that are read from the CSV file in each frame.

member.name: P:CsvAdapters.CsvInputAdapter.TransverseMode
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that determines whether CSV file is in transverse mode for real-time concentration.

member.name: P:CsvAdapters.CsvInputAdapter.SimulateTimestamp
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that determines whether timestamps are simulated for the purposes of real-time concentration.

member.name: P:CsvAdapters.CsvInputAdapter.ColumnMappings
member.summary: Defines the column mappings must defined: e.g., 0=Timestamp; 1=PPA:12; 2=PPA13.

member.name: P:CsvAdapters.CsvInputAdapter.UseAsyncConnect
member.summary: Gets a flag that determines if this uses an asynchronous connection.

member.name: P:CsvAdapters.CsvInputAdapter.Status
member.summary: Returns the detailed status of this .

member.name: P:CsvAdapters.CsvInputAdapter.SupportsTemporalProcessing
member.summary: Gets the flag indicating if this adapter supports temporal processing.

member.name: M:CsvAdapters.CsvInputAdapter.Dispose(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the object and optionally releases the managed resources.
member.param: true to release both managed and unmanaged resources; false to release only unmanaged resources.
